name: WCW - The Main Event [GB]
description: Now, World Championship Wrestling comes to the small screen in WCW Wrestling - The Main Event - but the screen is the only thing that's small about this game! BIG action! BIG excitement! BIG choice of more than 20 wrestling moves, including each wrestler's own personal Signature Move! 1 Meg of memory! 9 BIG WCW wrestlers to choose from!
